survey.introduction: I'm from Communicus, a consumer opinion firm. We are cting a survey and would like to include you.
questions: Do you smoke filter, non-menthol cigarettes?
How many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?

Which of the following statements apply to you? A. I eat dinner in a restaurant at least once a month. B. I read a daily newspaper. C. I do most of the food shopping for myself and/or my family. D. I have taken an airline trip on a scheduled commercial airline in the past 12 months.
